data.message: Why am I being blocked from commenting on other's post' I don't use profanity, and I see where others are allowed to make very vulgar comments.

replies.message: Hi Barbara. It sounds like you may have over-used a feature, even if you didn't mean to. Hold tight until you can access the feature again. In the meantime, you can learn more about our policies by reviewing the Facebook Community Standards: http://bit.ly/2k1bKRj. -Hannah

How can u over use the commenting on others posts that don't make sense I thought a social media was to talk to friends and have fun this is gonna do nothing but cause trouble between people cause if we just comment here and there and couple times a day your friends are gonna start thinking we are trying to avoid them and that we hate them feelings are gonna be unnecessarily hurt and friendships broken this is just not right
Sounds more like you been blocked by the account holder, political parties do this alot
Dreama Buchanan Because Facebook staff is full of democraps.
